snippet: At House Republicans' retreat to discuss the future of their conference, Representative Paul D. Ryan warned members that they have to "recognize the realities of the divided government that we have."
abstract: At House Republicans' retreat to discuss the future of their conference, Representative Paul D. Ryan warned members that they have to "recognize the realities of the divided government that we have."

headline.main: At Republican Retreat, Ryan Urges Unity on Fiscal Issues
